pages.text: You've found a portable $(bold)Key Enscribing Station!$() This block will allow you to activate blank portal keys the same as an End Portal Frame would. However, it may have a limited number of uses and can break.

The Key Enscribing Station has 3 states of damage just like an anvil. The odds of each use causing one level of damage is configurable, but by default the odds are 100%. Therefore a Key Enscribing Station can be used 3 times before it breaks.
